compehensive-manual.md.description: comprehensive manual defines end-to-end clinical and administrative workflows for the Engrace Hospice Electronic Health Record (EHR) system, ensuring full compliance with Medicare Conditions of Participation (42 CFR Part 418), the Hospice Outcomes and Patient Evaluation (HOPE) assessment tool, and Oregon state hospice regulations.

Hospice_EHR_Role_Based_Workflows.md.description: Comprehensive role-based access control and workflow documentation for a hospice EHR system, detailing 20 different user roles (from Super Administrator to Music Therapist), their dashboard views, module permissions, and specific clinical workflows. This document serves as the authoritative reference for implementing RBAC/ABAC policies, designing UI dashboards per role, and understanding the business logic for access restrictions in the Chartwarden application.

project-overview.md.description: Comprehensive project overview and architecture documentation detailing a HIPAA-compliant hospice EHR system built with Fastify and Next.js in a monorepo structure, including database schemas, API routes, security mechanisms, and regulatory compliance requirements.
